tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quality_control_inspection_results (
    inspection_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspection_result VARCHAR(10),
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50)
);
CREATE TABLE QualityControlInspections ( inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_id INT, inspection_date DATE, inspector_name VARCHAR(255), inspection_result VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE Products ( product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(255), production_date DATE, manufacturer VARCHAR(255), product_type VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE Inspectors ( inspector_id INT PRIMARY KEY, inspector_name VARCHAR(255), department VARCHAR(255), experience_years INT );

CREATE TABLE QualityControlInspectionResults (
  inspection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id UUID,
  inspection_date TIMESTAMP,
  inspector_id UUID,
  result VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Product (
  product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  product_category VARCHAR(255),
  manufacturing_date DATE,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Inspector (
  inspector_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(255),
  hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ProductTraceability (
  trace_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id UUID,
  trace_date TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE inspection_results (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
  result VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE product (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturing_date DATE,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
  product_type VARCHAR(20)
);
